name: Geome
description:
Protect and grow the planet until life evolves. 

Made for the Go Godot Jam 3

Controls:

  •  WASD/Arrows to move
  • E to interact
  • Left Mouse to laser
  • Space for some menus
  • Esc to Pause

Credits

Music by livvux from Pixabay

SFX by Kenny

Name Suggestion by FredsPipa

Water Resistant font by Vladimir Nikolic
